Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/California
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Harrison, California, Van Buren, Sacramento and Harrison; EB: Harrison, Sacramento, Congress, California and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Harrison/California.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, California, Van Buren, Sacramento and Harrison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Sacramento, Congress, California and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
